'''Tonight's Hilichurl Menu''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Defeat all the hilichurls

==Notes==
* Enemies in this Random Event do not drop items, [[Character EXP]], or [[Mora]].
* Sumpter Beast(s) will also be present. When the player [[Aggravation|alert]]s the hilichurls, the Sumpter Beast(s) will run away. They do not need to be defeated to complete the Random Event. They also will not drop anything if defeated.

===Ashavan Realm and Vissudha Field===
Enemies:{{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl; Hilichurl Fighter * 2}}
Also present: {{Item|Shaggy Sumpter Beast|type=Wildlife|x=2}}

===Land of Upper Setekh and Hypostyle Desert===
Enemies:{{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl; Hilichurl Fighter; Hilichurl Shooter * 2}}
Also present: {{Item|Desert Sumpter Beast|type=Wildlife}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Paimon:''' Look! It's the hilichurls, and there are Sumpter Beasts with them! Are they going to transport all that food?
:'''Paimon:''' Well... If they have nothing to eat, they should soon become too weak to cause any harm, right?
:'''Paimon:''' Let's teach them a lesson! For the sake of tonight's meal&mdash; Uhh, Paimon means, for the villagers' safety...
{{Dialogue end}}
